title: evga rtx 3060 stuck on caching kernals help
body:
recently upgraded to an  nvidia evga rtx 3060 12gb graphics card because my old card gave out. when i try to train or merge or do anything really in dfl 2.0 i am stuck on gpu caching kernals?
any ideas what the issue could be and how to resolve? 

one time in training i was able to push past that part and it loaded all the data for training but never loaded the training window or began training. also on merger once i was able to load all the samples but wouldnt open to window or run. i also cant i also cant preform a data dst faceset extract, stuck on caching gpu kernals. 
i have been using dfl for about 1 year no problems on my old graphics card before it gave out.
 side note i also downloaded msi afterburner to get the fans to run on the gpu because they werent running on their own.
any help would be appreciated, thank you
